SQLWhere.SQLJoin: left outer join dbo.SESSIONRESTRICT sr on sr.ID=tblmain.IDA and sr.CLASS='ACTOR' and sr.SESSIONID='%%SESSIONID%%'
SQLWhere.SQLWhere: ( (sr.ID is not null) or ( (not exists(select 1 from dbo.ACTORMODEL where IDA=tblmain.IDA)) and ((tblmain.IDAINS=%%ID_USER%% and tblmain.IDAUPD is null) or tblmain.IDAUPD=%%ID_USER%%) ) )

Condition.SQLWhere: IDIMMETHOD in ( select min(IDIMMETHOD) from dbo.IMMETHOD where (DTENABLED <= getdate() and ((DTDISABLED is null) or (DTDISABLED > getdate()))) group by IDENTIFIER)

Information.ToolTipMessage: FIX:\r\nTag 744 AssignmentMethod.\r\nMethod by which short positions are assigned to an exercise notice during exercise and assignment processing

Condition.SQLWhere: IDIMMETHOD in ( select min(IDIMMETHOD) from dbo.IMMETHOD where (DTENABLED <= getdate() and ((DTDISABLED is null) or (DTDISABLED > getdate()))) group by IDENTIFIER)
IDIMMETHOD in ( select min(IDIMMETHOD) from dbo.IMMETHOD where (DTENABLED <= getdate() and ((DTDISABLED is null) or (DTDISABLED > getdate()))) group by IDENTIFIER)
